name: Keep Your Heart Blooming
description:
Keep Your Heart Blooming was created for My First Game Jam - Winter 2019 with the theme of "love." It was meant to be a clone of "Journey of the Prairie King" from Stardew Valley.

Armed with her trusty slingshot, Lisa (short for Lamprocapnos spectabilis) must protect her flower heart from the darkness of Mr. Depresso and Asterisk.

Inspired by

  • Keep Your Heart Blooming playlist
  • http://yunepinku.tumblr.com/
  • https://www.instagram.com/tiny.plant/

Credits

Music by Eric Matyas - https://soundimage.org/

Sound Effects by NoiseForFun.com - https://www.noiseforfun.com/

This is my first game ever made in Unity and it was a lot of fun. I intend to make more in the future.

Please feel free to leave any questions/comments/feedback!

yoroshiku ne~~geraldine
